SELECT children.id FROM t_sys_org, t_sys_org as children WHERE t_sys_org.left_num <= children.left_num AND t_sys_org.right_num >= children.left_num and t_sys_org.id = #{record.orgId} order by t_sys_org.node_level ASC
mapper.select: SELECT t_house_vr_type.* FROM t_house_vr_type WHERE t_house_vr_type.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_house_vr_type.id

FROM t_house_vr_type
,() AS ownedOrgIds
WHERE 1=1
AND t_house_vr_type.org_id = ownedOrgIds.id
AND t_house_vr_type.id = #{record.id}
AND t_house_vr_type.community_id = #{record.communityId}
AND t_house_vr_type.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.name},'%')
